name: Progress Bar: The Game
description:
An original take on progress bars, where you are challenged with all of the things that actual progress bars experience.* "Progress Bar - The Game" was made in 20 hours for no particular reason. Use only the arrow keys to control, and enjoy the most action packed loading screen you will ever see. Have fun, and feel free to tell me what you think on twitter or in the comments below!

Made by Mirai Engineering: @mirexengine

*Disregard the previous part
